post:
[1TBVPS.com](https://1tbvps.com) is getting in on the Black Friday Fun with an incredible Black Friday Offer for everyone! 

With massive specs and over-engineered servers on a KVM platform, run by real systems administrators, 1TBVPS has the power you need for your linux workload, and zero oversubscription of RAM or disk space guaranteed!

Normally priced at $24.99 /mo, but for a very limited time, our super high end VPS configuration is discounted to just $15 / mo or $150 / year:

============

**Features you get with every VPS server:**

* Massive 1TB SSD-Cached RAID 10 storage
* Incredible 8GB Ram
* 20TB bandwidth on 1gbps port
* 8v CPU’s
* KVM VPS Platform

~~$24.99 /mo~~ $15.00 /mo with coupon **GRAVY** *

*Or*

~~$299.88 /yr~~ $150.00 /yr with coupon **TURKEY** *

[Buy Now](https://billing.1tbvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=6)

* *Limited to the first fifteen orders for each offer*

============

Your [1TBVPS.com](https://1tbvps.com/) VPS is hosted in Phoenix, AZ using [IOFLOOD.com](http://www.ioflood.com) dedicated servers.

[Learn More](https://1tbvps.com/)

**Questions?**
*Please email sales @ 1tbvps.com and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.*
